name: Untitled Ant Game
description:
This is a game that our team is working on for GAM220 at Falmouth University!

You play as an ant. It's a puzzle game. That's it really.

At the moment it's a very simple prototype meant to show off mechanics and basic puzzles. Have a play if you'd like!

Controls:
WASD: Move
E: Pick up/throw
Mouse: Aim

Team -

Programming:
Ryan Kerry
Damian Tsui

Design:
George Barber
Xav Benbow
David Miller

Art:
Elan Cholerton (3D Character Art)
Tom Bridge (Character/Environment Art)
